paramDescription: when true will stop SparkSession after job execution
location of graph table to promote
canonical name of graph table row class
location of action payload to promote
canonical name of action payload class
strategy for merging graph table objects with action payload instances, MERGE_FROM_AND_GET or SELECT_NEWER_AND_GET
strategy for promoting the actionset contents into the graph tables, ENRICH or UPSERT (default)
indicates whether the promotion operation should group objects in the graph by id or not
